content: NEW YORK (IFR) - Spice maker McCormick & Co's US$2.5bn benchmark trade to finance its purchase of Reckitt Benckiser's food division was inundated with investor attention after the issuer paid up to a 10bp premium to get its deal past a nervy high-grade market.
